mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMPANY WHERE COM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMPANY WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(COM_END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND COM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM COMPANY WHERE COM_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY 5 DESC
SELECT * FROM COMPANY WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(COM_END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT * FROM COMPANY WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND COM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMPANY
COM_STATUS = 'Y'
AND ((COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (COM_DIVISION LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (COM_CEO LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%'))
AND COM_DIVISION LIKE '%' || #{comDivision} || '%'
AND COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{comName} || '%'
AND COM_CEO LIKE '%' || #{comCeo} || '%'

SELECT * FROM COMPANY
COM_STATUS = 'Y'
AND ((COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (COM_DIVISION LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (COM_CEO LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%'))
AND COM_DIVISION LIKE '%' || #{comDivision} || '%'
AND COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{comName} || '%'
AND COM_CEO LIKE '%' || #{comCeo} || '%'
ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT CONTRACTEND, CONTRACTING, CONTRACTALL FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTEND FROM COMPANY WHERE (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') > TO_CHAR(COM_END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND COM_STATUS = 'Y'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTING FROM COMPANY WHERE (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(COM_END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND COM_STATUS = 'Y'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTALL FROM COMPANY WHERE COM_STATUS = 'Y')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN WHERE A_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ADMIN LEFT JOIN COMPANY USING(COM_CODE) WHERE A_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A_ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM ADMIN JOIN COMPANY USING(COM_CODE) WHERE A_CODE = #{aCode} AND A_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN LEFT JOIN COMPANY USING(COM_CODE)
A_STATUS = 'Y'
AND ((COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (A_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (A_NAME LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (A_ID LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%'))
AND COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{comName} || '%'
AND A_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%' || #{aDepartment} || '%'
AND A_NAME LIKE '%' || #{aName} || '%'
AND A_ID LIKE '%' || #{aId} || '%'

SELECT * FROM ADMIN LEFT JOIN COMPANY USING(COM_CODE)
A_STATUS = 'Y'
AND ((COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (A_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (A_NAME LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (A_ID LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%'))
AND COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{comName} || '%'
AND A_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%' || #{aDepartment} || '%'
AND A_NAME LIKE '%' || #{aName} || '%'
AND A_ID LIKE '%' || #{aId} || '%'
ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT CONTRACTA, CONTRACTB, CONTRACTC, CONTRACTD FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTA FROM ADMIN WHERE A_DEPARTMENT = '보안' AND A_STATUS = 'Y'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTB FROM ADMIN WHERE (A_DEPARTMENT = '미화' OR A_DEPARTMENT = '인력') AND A_STATUS = 'Y'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTC FROM ADMIN WHERE A_DEPARTMENT = '시설' AND A_STATUS = 'Y'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTD FROM ADMIN WHERE (A_DEPARTMENT LIKE '편의시설' OR A_DEPARTMENT LIKE '기타') AND A_STATUS = 'Y')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BULLETINBOARD WHERE BB_CATEGORY = '2'
SELECT * FROM BULLETINBOARD WHERE BB_CATEGORY = '2' ORDER BY BB_CREATEDATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BULLETINBOARD
BB_CATEGORY = '2'
AND ((BB_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (BB_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (BB_DCATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%'))
AND BB_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{bbTitle} || '%'
AND BB_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{bbContent} || '%'
AND BB_DCATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{bbDcategory} || '%'

SELECT * FROM BULLETINBOARD
BB_CATEGORY = '2'
AND ((BB_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (BB_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (BB_DCATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%'))
AND BB_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{bbTitle} || '%'
AND BB_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{bbContent} || '%'
AND BB_DCATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{bbDcategory} || '%'
ORDER BY ROWNUM
mapper.update: UPDATE BULLETINBOARD SET BB_STATUS = 'N' WHERE BB_CODE = #{bbCode} AND (BB_STATUS = 'L' OR BB_STATUS = 'Y')
UPDATE BULLETINBOARD SET BB_STATUS = 'L' WHERE BB_CODE = #{bbCode} AND (BB_STATUS = 'N' OR BB_STATUS = 'Y')
UPDATE BULLETINBOARD SET BB_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE BB_CODE = #{bbCode} AND (BB_STATUS = 'L' OR BB_STATUS = 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT CONTRACTA, CONTRACTB, CONTRACTC, CONTRACTD FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTA FROM BULLETINBOARD WHERE BB_CATEGORY = '2'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTB FROM BULLETINBOARD WHERE BB_CATEGORY = '2' AND BB_STATUS = 'N'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTC FROM BULLETINBOARD WHERE BB_CATEGORY = '2' AND BB_STATUS = 'L'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTD FROM BULLETINBOARD WHERE BB_CATEGORY = '2' AND BB_STATUS = 'Y')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FACILITYTASK
SELECT * FROM FACILITYTASK JOIN COMPANY ON(COMPANY.COM_CODE = FACILITYTASK.FT_NEED) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
SELECT * FROM FACILITYTASK JOIN COMPANY ON(COMPANY.COM_CODE = FACILITYTASK.FT_NEED) WHERE FT_CODE = #{ft_code}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FACILITYTASK JOIN COMPANY ON(COMPANY.COM_CODE = FACILITYTASK.FT_NEED)
AND ((FT_CATE LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (FT_DETAIL LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (FT_NEED LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%'))
AND FT_CATE LIKE '%' || #{ft_cate} || '%'
AND FT_DETAIL LIKE '%' || #{ft_detail} || '%'
AND FT_NEED LIKE '%' || #{ft_need} || '%'

SELECT * FROM FACILITYTASK JOIN COMPANY ON(COMPANY.COM_CODE = FACILITYTASK.FT_NEED)
AND ((FT_CATE LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (FT_DETAIL LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%') OR (FT_NEED LIKE '%' || #{all} || '%'))
AND FT_CATE LIKE '%' || #{ft_cate} || '%'
AND FT_DETAIL LIKE '%' || #{ft_detail} || '%'
AND FT_NEED LIKE '%' || #{ft_need} || '%'
ORDER BY ROWNUM
mapper.update: UPDATE FACILITYTASK SET FT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE FT_CODE = #{ft_code} AND (FT_STATUS = 'L' OR FT_STATUS = 'Y')
UPDATE FACILITYTASK SET FT_STATUS = 'L' WHERE FT_CODE = #{ft_code} AND (FT_STATUS = 'N' OR FT_STATUS = 'Y')
UPDATE FACILITYTASK SET FT_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE FT_CODE = #{ft_code} AND (FT_STATUS = 'L' OR FT_STATUS = 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT CONTRACTA, CONTRACTB, CONTRACTC, CONTRACTD FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTA FROM FACILITYTASK), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTB FROM FACILITYTASK WHERE FT_STATUS = 'N'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTC FROM FACILITYTASK WHERE FT_STATUS = 'L'), (SELECT COUNT(*) CONTRACTD FROM FACILITYTASK WHERE FT_STATUS = 'Y')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EXPENSE WHERE EX_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM EXPENSE JOIN COMPANY USING(COM_CODE) WHERE EX_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY EX_CODE DESC
SELECT E.*, W.COM_NAME FROM EXPENSE E JOIN COMPANY W ON(E.COM_CODE = W.COM_CODE) WHERE E.EX_CODE = #{exCode} AND EX_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT (SELECT SUM(EX_PRICE) FROM EXPENSE WHERE SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 1, 2) LIKE '16') EX_PRICE16, (SELECT SUM(EX_PRICE) FROM EXPENSE WHERE SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 1, 2) LIKE '17') EX_PRICE17, (SELECT SUM(EX_PRICE) FROM EXPENSE WHERE SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 1, 2) LIKE '18') EX_PRICE18, (SELECT SUM(EX_PRICE) FROM EXPENSE WHERE SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 1, 2) LIKE '19') EX_PRICE19, (SELECT SUM(EX_PRICE) FROM EXPENSE WHERE SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 1, 2) LIKE '20') EX_PRICE20 FROM EXPENSE WHERE ROWNUM =1
